name: Sniper Crime Contract of Down Town Mafia
name_original: Sniper Crime Contract of Down Town Mafia
description:
Sniper Crime Contract of Down Town Mafia

A lot of interesting criminal missions!

Enthralling gameplay: car theft and murder ordinary citizens!
Real Auto Crime Simulator 3d is one of the best shooting games, felony simulator and gangster games available!
Fun and challenging addictive free roaming action driven miami mafia gameplay.

AN ARSENAL OF WEAPONS
Choose from a gun store: Machine Guns, RPGs, Sniper Rifles and Shotguns.

Enjoy this combo Games in grand City !! This Game is about Grand thief. Lots of mission & activities of thief in this game like.

In this challenging FPS Killer Shooter Crime, we put some new features such as the laser shooting, zoom in and identify terrorists and realistic weather condition add the new challenges to complete missions.

To know more about this game please download this running Game.
It is Free to Download and Play.

Key features:

=> Amazing township environment
=> Real life weapons and gangster cars
=> Realistic special effects
=> Best crime simulator game feeling ever!!
